transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji, main bolie.
Executive: Hi, Jitender baat kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, ye Ascent Enterprises mein baat ho rahi hai meri?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir, main Rukhsar baat kar rahi hoon Priya ki manager IndiaMART se.
Customer: Bolie.
Executive: Actually, main aapko call kar rahi thi ki aapka ek concern hamare paas hai. Priya ne yahan pe update kiya hai that aapko shayad apne 400 plus products hamare paas update karne hain, right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay. So, abhi currently hamare paas 59 products aapke update hain yahan par.
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Theek hai? To 59 products ke baad remaining jo products hain to uska total hoga 400, right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Nahi, uska hoga 400 minus 350 ke aas paas honge na?
Customer: Haan, 350, haan, 340, 340, 341.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan, 341 ke hisab se total product honge jo hume update karne honge yahan pe, theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab sir dekhiye jab aapki hosting hui thi tab aapne ye cheez check ki thi ki aapke products jo hain wo total pure jitne aapne diye hain utne update nahi hue hain?
Customer: Haan, check kara na unhone kaha tha hum kar denge fir kara nahi unhone.
Executive: Ji, theek hai, wo to main aage unke sath discussion karke wo update kara dungi.
Executive: Theek hai? To dekhiye sir, production team aap kitne products update karegi wo main ek bar unse baat kar leti hoon but at the same time agar aap same kuch kuch products apne Priya ke sath WhatsApp pe share kar de so that hum log unhe update kar de aur aapko DIY bhi hum log ek bar sikha denge ki kaise ye sab hoga.
Customer: Haan, wo to humne dekh liya.
Executive: Achha, aapne sikha diya? Theek hai. To sir dekhiye 400 plus products ab hume update karne ke liye thoda time lagega, aap ye samajhte hain.
Customer: Koi dikkat nahi, haan wo aise jaldbazi kuch bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Par wo kar hi nahi rahe the isliye maine raise kara ticket.
Executive: Koi baat nahi, main wahan se ek concern hum main unke sath ek email share kar deti hoon. Wo usko kar denge, baki products jo hain wo Priya update kar dengi. Par ye better rahega bahut agar aap kuch had tak photos with details agar aap Priya ko share kar de to Priya bhi unko thoda thoda karke add kar degi.
Customer: Ji?
Customer: Bhej to gaye, humne sab bhej kar already.
Executive: Sir, aapne production team mein bheja hua hai na? Aap agar apne account manager ko details bhejenge yani ki Priya jo hain apni assigning aapki manager hain agar aap unhe bhi details share kar denge to wo usko manually khud se bhi kar dengi, ye kam thoda jaldi ho jayega.
Customer: Theek hai, main bhej dunga.
Executive: Theek hai? Iske sath mein sir ye keh rahi thi ki bas yahi problem yahi bas ek concern tha sir iske alawa koi aur nahi tha?
Customer: Haan, yahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir, ye main aapko ye keh rahi hoon ki hamare paas jo concern aapka open hai isko close karke main ek internal concern apne paas ek open kar leti hoon feedback ke liye jab hamara kam khatam ho jayega hum usko close kar denge, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To abhi jo ye wala concern hai main isko close kar deti hoon, theek hai? Main concern open karungi main uska ticket ID aapko de dungi aap accordingly follow kar lijiyega hamare sath, theek hai? Aap Priya ko ek bar main Priya se kehti hoon aapko WhatsApp kar dengi aap WhatsApp pe unke sath mein ye sab share kar dijiyega material, theek hai? Okay sir, thank you, have a good day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to update 400+ products.

- Products not updated even after raising ticket.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to update the products.

- Suggested sharing details with account manager for faster update.

- Executive will share an email with the team.

- Executive will open an internal concern for feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share product details with Priya on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product update, account manager, concern, ticket
